dta.TPPlusTransitNode¶

class TPPlusTransitNode(nodeId, isStop, access, delay)¶

Bases: object

Representation of a transit node for a TPPlusTransitRoute

Basic transit node in a TPPlusTransitRoute.

  • nodeId is a node number
  • isStop is a boolean
  • access is an integer
  • delay is a float representing the delay at this node, in minutes
__init__(nodeId, isStop, access, delay)¶

Basic transit node in a TPPlusTransitRoute.

  • nodeId is a node number
  • isStop is a boolean
  • access is an integer
  • delay is a float representing the delay at this node, in minutes

Methods

__init__(nodeId, isStop, access, delay) Basic transit node in a TPPlusTransitRoute.

Attributes

ACCESS_ALIGHT int(x[, base]) -> integer
ACCESS_BOARD int(x[, base]) -> integer
ACCESS_BOTH int(x[, base]) -> integer
DELAY_VAL float(x) -> floating point number
ACCESS_ALIGHT = 2¶
ACCESS_BOARD = 1¶
ACCESS_BOTH = 0¶
DELAY_VAL = 0.0¶
